languages.text: "Мы узнали, как Кибелла попала в Кровавую паутину. Мы встретили ее семью".

traits.locale_text: "Ты разлучаешь детей с их семьями, а затем взращиваешь из них убийц. Мы все знаем".

languages.text: "We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."
languages.original_text: "Мы узнали, как Кибелла попала в Кровавую паутину. Мы встретили ее семью".

traits.locale_text: "We have learned how Kibellah ended up in the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."
"We have learned how Kibellah ended up in the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."
"We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."
"We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."
"We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."
"We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."

languages.text: « Nous avons rencontré la famille de Kibellah et découvert les circonstances dans lesquelles elle a intégré les rangs de la Toile de Sang. »
languages.original_text: "We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."

traits.locale_text: « Nous avons rencontré la famille de Kibellah et découvert les circonstances dans lesquelles elle a intégré les rangs de la Toile de Sang. »

languages.text: «Hemos descubierto cómo llegó Kibellah a unirse a la Red Sanguinolenta. Hemos conocido a su familia».
languages.original_text: "We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."

traits.locale_text: «Hemos descubierto cómo llegó Kibellah a unirse a la Red Sanguinolenta. Hemos conocido a su familia».

languages.text: 「キベラがブラッドスパン・ウェブの一員になった経緯を知った。彼女の家族に会った」
languages.original_text: "We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."

traits.locale_text: 「キベラがブラッドスパン・ウェブの一員になった経緯を知った。彼女の家族に会った」

languages.text: “我们已经弄清楚绮贝菈是怎么加入织血罗网的了，我们已经见过她的家人了。”
languages.original_text: "We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."

traits.locale_text: “我们已经弄清楚绮贝菈是怎么加入织血罗网的了，我们已经见过她的家人了。”

languages.text: "Wir haben erfahren, wie Kibellah Teil des Blutgesponnenen Netzes geworden ist. Wir sind ihrer Familie begegnet."
languages.original_text: "We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."

traits.locale_text: "Wir haben erfahren, wie Kibellah Teil des Blutgesponnenen Netzes geworden ist. Wir sind ihrer Familie begegnet."

languages.text: "Kibellah'nın nasıl Kanipi Ağı'nın bir parçası olduğunu öğrendik. Ailesiyle tanıştık."
languages.original_text: "We have learned how Kibellah came to be part of the Bloodspun Web. We have met her family."
